mapper.select: SELECT L.PRODUCT_NUMBER, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE FROM TBL_PRODUCT_LIKE L INNER JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON L.PRODUCT_NUMBER=P.PRODUCT_NUMBER WHERE L.MEMBER_NUMBER=#{memberNumber}
SELECT COUNT(PRODUCT_NUMBER) FROM TBL_PRODUCT_LIKE WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER=#{memberNumber}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_PRODUCT_LIKE WHERE PRODUCT_NUMBER=#{productNumber} AND MEMBER_NUMBER=#{memberNumber}
